mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO pet_basic_info ( id, userId, groupId, profileFilePath, profileFileName, petName, petBreed ,sex, birthday, neutralization, createDate ) VALUES ( null, #{userId}, #{groupId}, #{profileFilePath} , #{profileFileName} , #{petName} , #{petBreed} , #{sex} ,#{birthday}, #{neutralization}, now() )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
